verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦٓ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: We sent Noah to his People (with the Command): "Do thou warn thy People before there comes to them a grievous Penalty."
verses.transliteration: Inna arsalna noohan ilaqawmihi an anthir qawmaka min qabli an ya/tiyahum AAathabunaleem

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنِّى لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: He said: "O my People! I am to you a Warner, clear and open:
verses.transliteration: Qala ya qawmi innee lakum natheerunmubeen

verses.arabic: أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: "That ye should worship Allah, fear Him and obey me:
verses.transliteration: Ani oAAbudoo Allaha wattaqoohuwaateeAAoon

verses.arabic: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: "So He may forgive you your sins and give you respite for a stated Term: for when the Term given by Allah is accomplished, it cannot be put forward: if ye only knew."
verses.transliteration: Yaghfir lakum min thunoobikumwayu-akhkhirkum ila ajalin musamman inna ajala Allahiitha jaa la yu-akhkharu law kuntumtaAAlamoon

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِى لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا
verses.translation: He said: "O my Lord! I have called to my People night and day:
verses.transliteration: Qala rabbi innee daAAawtu qawmeelaylan wanahara

verses.arabic: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَآءِىٓ إِلَّا فِرَارًا
verses.translation: "But my call only increases (their) flight (from the Right).
verses.transliteration: Falam yazidhum duAAa-ee illafirara

verses.arabic: وَإِنِّى كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوٓا۟ أَصَـٰبِعَهُمْ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَٱسْتَغْشَوْا۟ ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا۟ وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ ٱسْتِكْبَارًا
verses.translation: "And every time I have called to them, that Thou mightest forgive them, they have (only) thrust their fingers into their ears, covered themselves up with their garments, grown obstinate, and given themselves up to arrogance.
verses.transliteration: Wa-innee kullama daAAawtuhumlitaghfira lahum jaAAaloo asabiAAahum fee athanihimwastaghshaw thiyabahum waasarroo wastakbarooistikbara

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا
verses.translation: "So I have called to them aloud;
verses.transliteration: Thumma innee daAAawtuhum jihara

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّىٓ أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
verses.translation: "Further I have spoken to them in public and secretly in private,
verses.transliteration: Thumma innee aAAlantu lahum waasrartu lahumisrara

verses.arabic: فَقُلْتُ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
verses.translation: "Saying, 'Ask forgiveness from your Lord; for He is Oft-Forgiving;
verses.transliteration: Faqultu istaghfiroo rabbakum innahu kanaghaffara

verses.arabic: يُرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًا
verses.translation: "'He will send rain to you in abundance;
verses.transliteration: Yursili assamaa AAalaykummidrara

verses.arabic: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَٰلٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَـٰرًا
verses.translation: "'Give you increase in wealth and sons; and bestow on you gardens and bestow on you rivers (of flowing water).
verses.transliteration: Wayumdidkum bi-amwalin wabaneenawayajAAal lakum jannatin wayajAAal lakum anhara

verses.arabic: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
verses.translation: "'What is the matter with you, that ye place not your hope for kindness and long-suffering in Allah,-
verses.transliteration: Ma lakum la tarjoona lillahiwaqara

verses.arabic: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
verses.translation: "'Seeing that it is He that has created you in diverse stages?
verses.transliteration: Waqad khalaqakum atwara

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا۟ كَيْفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقًا
verses.translation: "'See ye not how Allah has created the seven heavens one above another,
verses.transliteration: Alam taraw kayfa khalaqa AllahusabAAa samawatin tibaqa

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلَ ٱلْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
verses.translation: "'And made the moon a light in their midst, and made the sun as a (Glorious) Lamp?
verses.transliteration: WajaAAala alqamara feehinna nooran wajaAAalaashshamsa siraja

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا
verses.translation: "'And Allah has produced you from the earth growing (gradually),
verses.transliteration: Wallahu anbatakum mina al-ardinabata

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا
verses.translation: "'And in the End He will return you into the (earth), and raise you forth (again at the Resurrection)?
verses.transliteration: Thumma yuAAeedukum feehawayukhrijukum ikhraja

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا
verses.translation: "'And Allah has made the earth for you as a carpet (spread out),
verses.transliteration: Wallahu jaAAala lakumu al-ardabisata

verses.arabic: لِّتَسْلُكُوا۟ مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا
verses.translation: "'That ye may go about therein, in spacious roads.'"
verses.transliteration: Litaslukoo minha subulan fijaja

verses.arabic: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِى وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
verses.translation: Noah said: "O my Lord! They have disobeyed me, but they follow (men) whose wealth and children give them no increase but only Loss.
verses.transliteration: Qala noohun rabbi innahum AAasawneewattabaAAoo man lam yazidhu maluhu wawaladuhu illakhasara

verses.arabic: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا
verses.translation: "And they have devised a tremendous Plot.
verses.transliteration: Wamakaroo makran kubbara

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
verses.translation: "And they have said (to each other), 'Abandon not your gods: Abandon neither Wadd nor Suwa', neither Yaguth nor Ya'uq, nor Nasr';-
verses.transliteration: Waqaloo la tatharunna alihatakumwala tatharunna waddan wala suwaAAanwala yaghootha wayaAAooqa wanasra

verses.arabic: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَـٰلًا
verses.translation: "They have already misled many; and grant Thou no increase to the wrong-doers but in straying (from their mark)."
verses.transliteration: Waqad adalloo katheeran walatazidi aththalimeena illa dalala

verses.arabic: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٔـٰتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا۟ فَأُدْخِلُوا۟ نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارًا
verses.translation: Because of their sins they were drowned (in the flood), and were made to enter the Fire (of Punishment): and they found- in lieu of Allah- none to help them.
verses.transliteration: Mimma khatee-atihimoghriqoo faodkhiloo naran falam yajidoo lahum min dooniAllahi ansara

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
verses.translation: And Noah, said: "O my Lord! Leave not of the Unbelievers, a single one on earth!
verses.transliteration: Waqala noohun rabbi latathar AAala al-ardi mina alkafireenadayyara

verses.arabic: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا۟ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا
verses.translation: "For, if Thou dost leave (any of) them, they will but mislead Thy devotees, and they will breed none but wicked ungrateful ones.
verses.transliteration: Innaka in tatharhum yudillooAAibadaka wala yalidoo illa fajirankaffara

verses.arabic: رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَلِوَٰلِدَىَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِىَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًۢا
verses.translation: "O my Lord! Forgive me, my parents, all who enter my house in Faith, and (all) believing men and believing women: and to the wrong-doers grant Thou no increase but in perdition!"
verses.transliteration: Rabbi ighfir lee waliwalidayyawaliman dakhala baytiya mu/minan walilmu/mineena walmu/minatiwala tazidi aththalimeena illatabaran
